dev.jeka.core.api.depmanagement

Class JkIvyPublication<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • dev.jeka.core.api.depmanagement.JkIvyPublication<T>

  • public final class JkIvyPublication<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    Information required to publish a module in an Ivy repository.
